Uses of Class
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.AbstractWordToImage

Packages that use AbstractWordToImage
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage this package provides implementations of the WordToImage interface. 
 

Uses of AbstractWordToImage in com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage
 

Subclasses of AbstractWordToImage in com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage
 class ComposedWordToImage
          Base class for composed WordToImage It extends the AbstractWord to image and uses three abstract subclasses : a AbstractFontGenerator to implement the getFont() method a AbstractBackgroundGenerator to implement the getBackround() method a AbstractTextParser to implement the pasteText() method By this design people can implement separatly different parts of the algorithm.
 class FilteredComposedWordToImage
          This implementation uses filters to distord the image.
 class SimpleWordToImage
          Simple image to word implementation.
